document.full_text: the producers of a new broadway musical about the 1960s girl group the shirelles have been hit with a lawsuit charging them of pilfering the names and likenesses of the original members.
document.title: shirelles and dionne warwick sue new broadway show
lines_and_colors: the producers of a new broadway musical about the 1960s girl group the shirelles have been hit with a lawsuit charging them of pilfering the names and likenesses of the original members.
